title: Which guitar brand is better, Ibanez or Esp? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s really a matter of perception. Everyone likes different types of guitars. I like ESPs in general because I feel they have a better overall sound and playability than Ibanez. I’m not a big fan of Ibanez necks and bodies. EPSs are sturdier and sound fuller in my opinion. Pickups are a major factor choosing guitars too. It’s really a matter of choice. IMO ESP >>>>>>>>> Ibanez.

Both the brands have different body shapes, tones, comfort and playability. ESP is more for the metal players. Ibanez is a really versatile company so pretty much anything can be played on it. In short both of them are different, it depends on your style of playing.
